info.name: C2M API v2 - Getting Started (With Examples)
info.description:
Educational collection with realistic test data organized by usage patterns to help new users get started with the C2M API.

This collection demonstrates 16 common patterns across 3 categories:
- Most Frequently Used (3 patterns)
- Bulk Operations (3 patterns)
- Advanced Patterns (10 patterns)

All request bodies contain realistic example data (names, addresses, IDs) that can be used for immediate testing.

item.name: Most Frequently Used
item.description: The most common API calls for everyday use

description.content:
Submit a single document to one recipient using jobTemplate

Uses docSourceAll (requestId variant) and recipientAddressSource (singleAddress variant) with realistic test data

response.name: Success

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

body.raw:
{
  "docSourceAll": {
    "url": "https://api.example.com/v1/documents/5678"
  },
  "recipientAddressSource": {
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Smith",
    "address1": "123 Main Street",
    "address2": "Apt 4B",
    "address3": "",
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "zip": "10001",
    "country": "USA",
    "nickName": "Johnny",
    "phoneNumber": "+1-555-123-4567"
  },
  "jobTemplate": "template_l33QYgg7",
  "paymentDetails": {
    "achDetails": {
      "routingNumber": "021000021",
      "accountNumber": "1234567890",
      "checkDigit": 7
    }
  },
  "returnAddress": {
    "firstName": "Colleen",
    "lastName": "Gerhold",
    "address1": "71884 Ruecker Parks",
    "city": "Hannahtown",
    "state": "Connecticut",
    "zip": "69493-1713",
    "country": "Comoros",
    "address2": "38128 London Road",
    "address3": "87694 N 2nd Street"
  },
  "jobOptions": {
    "documentClass": "basic",
    "layout": "standard",
    "productionTime": "2026-02-16T12:40:04.643Z",
    "envelope": "standard",
    "color": "basic",
    "paperType": "basic",
    "printOption": "primary",
    "mailClass": "default"
  },
  "tags": [
    "<string>",
    "<string>"
  ]
}

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Missing required field
response.body:
{
  "errorType": "ValidationError",
  "errorMessage": "Required field is missing from request body",
  "errorCode": "MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELD",
  "errorDetails": "{\"field\": \"documentId\", \"location\": \"requestBody\"}",
  "errorTrackingId": "TRK-20260216-ABC123"
}

response.name: Invalid field format
response.body:
{
  "errorType": "ValidationError",
  "errorMessage": "Field contains invalid format or value",
  "errorCode": "INVALID_FORMAT",
  "errorDetails": "{\"field\": \"postalCode\", \"provided\": \"1234\", \"expected\": \"5 or 9 digits\"}",
  "errorTrackingId": "TRK-20260216-DEF456"
}

response.name: Missing authentication
response.body:
{
  "errorType": "AuthenticationError",
  "errorMessage": "Authorization header is missing or invalid",
  "errorCode": "MISSING_AUTH_HEADER",
  "errorDetails": "{\"expected\": \"Bearer <token>\", \"received\": \"none\"}",
  "errorTrackingId": "TRK-20260216-GHI789"
}

response.name: Insufficient permissions
response.body:
{
  "errorType": "AuthorizationError",
  "errorMessage": "User does not have required permissions for this operation",
  "errorCode": "INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS",
  "errorDetails": "{\"required\": \"jobs:write\", \"user\": \"read-only-user\"}",
  "errorTrackingId": "TRK-20260216-JKL012"
}

response.name: Resource not found
response.body:
{
  "errorType": "ResourceNotFoundError",
  "errorMessage": "Requested resource does not exist",
  "errorCode": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND",
  "errorDetails": "{\"resourceType\": \"document\", \"resourceId\": \"DOC-12345\"}",
  "errorTrackingId": "TRK-20260216-MNO345"
}

response.name: Validation failed
response.body:
{
  "errorType": "ValidationError",
  "errorMessage": "Request validation failed for multiple fields",
  "errorCode": "VALIDATION_FAILED",
  "errorDetails": "{\"errors\": [{\"field\": \"documentId\", \"issue\": \"not found\"}, {\"field\": \"recipientAddress.postalCode\", \"issue\": \"invalid format\"}]}",
  "errorTrackingId": "TRK-20260216-PQR678"
}

response.name: Internal server error
response.body:
{
  "errorType": "ServerError",
  "errorMessage": "An unexpected error occurred while processing the request",

}

item.name: Address capture - PDF with embedded addresses

request.name: Submit a single pdf addressCapture job

description.content:
Submit PDF where addresses are extracted from the document

No recipientAddressSource needed - addresses are captured from PDF content

item.name: Bulk Operations
item.description: High-volume processing for multiple documents or recipients

request.name: Submit a single pdf split addressCapture job

description.content:
Split a multi-page PDF and capture addresses from each section

Uses pdfSplitJobsNoAddress (startPage/endPage without recipientAddressSource) with realistic page ranges

response.name: Success

item.name: Multiple documents from ZIP with address capture

Submit multiple documents from a ZIP file with embedded addresses

Uses zipDocumentSource (zip-only document sources) with realistic IDs

item.name: Advanced Patterns
item.description: Advanced features and edge cases for complex workflows

request.name: Submit a multi doc merge job

description.content:
Combine multiple documents into one before mailing

Uses mergeDocumentSource (documentsToMerge array) with realistic document IDs

body.raw:
{
  "mergeDocumentSource": [
    "<integer>",
    "<integer>"
  ],
  "recipientAddressSource": {
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Smith",
    "address1": "123 Main Street",
    "address2": "Apt 4B",
    "address3": "",
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "zip": "10001",
    "country": "USA",
    "nickName": "Johnny",
    "phoneNumber": "+1-555-123-4567"
  },
  "jobTemplate": "template_RapYzoGk",
  "paymentDetails": {
    "achDetails": {
      "routingNumber": "021000021",
      "accountNumber": "1234567890",
      "checkDigit": 7
    }
  },
  "returnAddress": {
    "firstName": "Rudolph",
    "lastName": "Lebsack",
    "address1": "4472 Denesik Pine",
    "city": "Appleton",
    "state": "Arizona",
    "zip": "33196-8668",
    "country": "Philippines",
    "address2": "88783 Luettgen Crossing",
    "address3": "70407 Casandra Locks"
  },
  "tags": [
    "<string>",
    "<string>"
  ]
}

description.content:
Specify job options directly instead of using a template

Uses jobOptions (documentClass, layout, etc.) instead of jobTemplate with realistic values

response.name: Success

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

body.raw:
{
  "docSourceAll": {
